title: "IISc research team designs eye gaze-controlled robotic arm for speech and motor impaired"
excerpt: "An Indian Institute of Science (IISc) research team has designed a robotic arm that can be manipulated by eye movement using a computer interface, to help people with Severe Speech and Motor Impairment (SSMI)."
